overview: When Jett stumbles into the world of vampire pop culture, he finds it’s not all it’s cracked up to be.  As his school crush Maddy falls for an Edward Cullen wanna-be, Jett tries to gain the knowledge (and the hair) to make himself a vampire fangirl’s dream.  But an unexpected encounter with a real creature of the night forces him to learn the true meaning of “vampire” the hard way.
title: Love Bites
